This is a similar attempt as #10411, with the broader scope

<!--*Please add a concise summary of your suggestion here.*-->

### Rationale

1. We have long desired to make a package work in more than 1 type of Spack "build system" at a time, e.g. if a package switches from using autotools to cmake. See #12941 for context. https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/12941#issuecomment-538870806 describes the consensus on use cases and tries to lay out one possible solution.



3. We define our dependency types in terms of other much more granular information here: https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/packaging_guide.html?highlight=dependency%20type#dependency-types. Why not expose an API for the much more granular information?
